metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000247 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
mpg123 memory overread

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpg123-0 - 1.25.8-1
libout123-0 - 1.25.8-1
mpg123 - 1.25.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpg123 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.25.8-1').
